programme.title: Row over Cambodia aid
programme.short_synopsis: Ford presses for further aid package to Cambodia.
programme.medium_synopsis: Congress unhappy over President Ford's demands for additional aid to battle-torn Cambodia.
programme.long_synopsis:
Congress unhappy over President Ford's demands for additional aid to battle-torn Cambodia.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
